nodes.text: Luke's Backpack was a blue colored satchel made on Dantooine out of gundark-skin that belonged to Luke Skywalker. It possessed many pockets, which Skywalker used while on patrol to hold supplies. Skywalker wore it on Dagobah, when he was under Yoda's tutelage. Yoda rode inside the backpack at least once, instructing Luke during a training run.
